page.title: 13Social Concerns - Yardley
page.content: Our area is mainly housing,Therefore matters of concern revolve around questions of amenities and general care of the area.The condition of the pavements is something many people were anxious about.The general feeling is that people parking their cars on the pavements make the situation worse.Litter also troubles residents.There is a feeling everyone should take responsibility for remedying this.People feel there is a need in the immediate area to provide more amenities for leisure, especially for young children and teenagers. People are afraid the problems of vandalism and petty crime will worsen if facilities are not improved.
